languages.text: "Правды, мон-кай. Это же так просто, верно? Немного откровенности перед лицом сил, что вращают этот мир. У меня есть инструменты, чтобы извлечь самые сокровенные тайны из потаенных уголков твоего сознания — но меня интересуют не твои личные секреты, а то, что позволит мне уберечь мой кабал".

"Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty before the powers that be. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."
languages.original_text: "Правды, мон-кай. Это же так просто, верно? Немного откровенности перед лицом сил, что вращают этот мир. У меня есть инструменты, чтобы извлечь самые сокровенные тайны из потаенных уголков твоего сознания — но меня интересуют не твои личные секреты, а то, что позволит мне уберечь мой кабал".

traits.locale_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty in the face of the forces that make this world go round. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind — but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will save my Kabal from the depredations of its most hated enemy."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty in the face of the forces that make this world go round. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind — but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will save my Kabal from the depredations of its most hated enemy."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty in the face of the powerful. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."

I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty before the powers that be. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: « Seulement la vérité, mon-keigh. Il n'y a rien de plus simple, n'est-ce pas ? Un peu d'honnêteté face aux pouvoirs en place. Je dispose de tous les outils nécessaires pour extirper les mystères les plus convoités des recoins les plus enfouis de votre esprit, mais vos secrets personnels ne m'intéressent pas. Je ne veux que ce qui protégera ma Kabale. »
languages.original_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty before the powers that be. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: « Seulement la vérité, mon-keigh. Il n'y a rien de plus simple, n'est-ce pas ? Un peu d'honnêteté face aux puissants. Je dispose de tous les outils nécessaires pour extirper les mystères les plus convoités des recoins les plus enfouis de votre esprit, mais vos secrets personnels ne m'intéressent pas. Je ne veux que ce qui protégera ma Kabale. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: “我只想得到真相，猴子。很简单，对不对？我只需要你面对位高权重之人时诚实一点。我有办法从你内心深处挖掘出最令人垂涎的秘密，但我对你的个人秘密不感兴趣，我只想得到那些能保护我的阴谋团的情报。”
languages.original_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty before the powers that be. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: “我只想得到真相，猴子。很简单，对不对？我只需要你面对强大之人时诚实一点。我有办法从你内心深处挖掘出最令人垂涎的秘密，但我对你的个人秘密不感兴趣，我只想得到那些能保护我的阴谋团的情报。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: 「真実だけだ、モン＝ケイ。とてもシンプルだろう？権力者の手前、ほんの少しの誠実さを示すだけでいい。俺はお前の心の奥底に眠る最も魅力的な謎を探り出す道具を持っているが、お前の個人的な秘密には興味がない。俺が欲しいのは、俺の陰謀団を守るものだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty before the powers that be. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: 「真実だけだ、モン＝ケイ。とてもシンプルだろう？権力者の手前、ほんの少しの誠実さを示すだけでいい。俺はお前の心の奥底に眠る最も魅力的な謎を探り出す道具を持っているが、お前の個人的な秘密には興味がない。俺が欲しいのは、俺の陰謀団を守るものだけだ」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Nur die Wahrheit, Chem-Pan-Sey. Das Einfachste der Welt, oder? Ein wenig Ehrlichkeit gegenüber den herrschenden Mächten. Ich habe das nötige Werkzeug, um an die begehrtesten Geheimnisse in den tiefsten Nischen Eures Verstands zu kommen, aber ich habe keinerlei Interesse an Euren persönlichen Geheimnissen. Ich will nur bekommen, was meine Kabale schützt."
languages.original_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty before the powers that be. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: "Nur die Wahrheit, Chem-Pan-Sey. Das Einfachste der Welt, oder? Ein bisschen Ehrlichkeit angesichts der Mächtigen. Ich habe das nötige Werkzeug, um an die begehrtesten Geheimnisse in den tiefsten Nischen Eures Verstands zu kommen, aber ich habe keinerlei Interesse an Euren persönlichen Geheimnissen. Ich will nur bekommen, was meine Kabale schützt."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: «Tan solo la verdad, mon-keigh. Es muy simple, ¿no te parece? Un poco de sinceridad delante de los poderes fácticos. Dispongo de las herramientas necesarias para arrancar los misterios más preciados de los rincones más profundos de tu mente, pero no me interesan tus secretos personales. Solo quiero lo que puede proteger a mi Kábala».
languages.original_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty before the powers that be. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: «Tan solo la verdad, mon-keigh. Es muy simple, ¿no te parece? Un poco de sinceridad con los poderosos. Dispongo de las herramientas necesarias para arrancar los misterios más preciados de los rincones más profundos de tu mente, pero no me interesan tus secretos personales. Solo quiero lo que puede proteger a mi kábala».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Yalnızca gerçeği mon-keigh. Çok basit, öyle değil mi? Üstünlüğüm karşısında dürüst olmanı. Zihninin en derin kuytularındaki en değerli gizemleri çekebilecek gereçlere sahibim ancak şahsi sırlarınla ilgilenmiyorum. Yalnızca Kabalımı korumak için gerekenleri istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Only the truth, mon-keigh. So very simple, is it not? A little honesty before the powers that be. I have the tools to extract the most coveted mysteries from the deepest recesses of your mind, but I am not interested in your personal secrets. I only want that which will protect my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca gerçeği mon-keigh. Çok basit yani, değil mi? Gücümü kullanmadan önce biraz dürüstlük. Zihninin en derin kuytularındaki en değerli gizemleri çekebilecek gereçlere sahibim ancak senin kişisel sırların beni ilgilendirmiyor. Yalnızca Kabal'ımı korumak için gereken şeyleri istiyorum."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
